Adventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Adventurer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Adventurer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Adventurer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Adventurer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Adventurer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Adventurer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Adventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Adventurer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Adventurer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Adventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Adventurer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Adventurer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
